keel.Algorithms.Shared.ClassicalOptim

Class GCNet

  • java.lang.Object
    • keel.Algorithms.Shared.ClassicalOptim.GCNet

  • public class GCNet
extends java.lang.Object

     Wrapper for a perceptron (ConjGradNN). Also this class allows to call the desired training method of the aggregated percetron:
  * nntrain: for invoking Conjugated Gradient.
  * nntrainDG: for invoking the Descendent Gradient.

    Since:
    JDK1.4

    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Written by Luciano SÃ¡nchez (University of Oviedo) 27/02/2004, Modified by Enrique A. de la Cal (University of Oviedo) 13/12/2008

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      double[] nnoutput(double[] x)
      Calculated the output of present perceptron with input x and returns it in original scale.
      double nntrain(int nInputs, int nOutputs, double[][] examples, double[][] outputs, int[] topology, double[] weights, Randomize r)
      trains a perceptron with Conjugated Gradient algorithm and returns the mean square error of neural network output compared to expected output.
      double nntrainGD(int nInputs, int nOutputs, double[][] examples, double[][] outputs, int[] topology, double[] weights, Randomize r)
      trains a perceptron with Conjugated Descendent algorithm and returns the mean square error of neural network output compared to expected output.
      java.lang.String printNet()
      Returns the weights as a String for printing or storing purposes

    • Method Detail

      • nntrain

        public double nntrain(int nInputs,
                      int nOutputs,
                      double[][] examples,
                      double[][] outputs,
                      int[] topology,
                      double[] weights,
                      Randomize r)

        trains a perceptron with Conjugated Gradient algorithm and returns the mean square error of neural network output compared to expected output.

        Parameters:
        nInputs - number of inputs in first layer
        nOutputs - number of output in output layer
        examples - training examples
        outputs - expected outputs
        topology - net topology (cardinality of the hidder layers)
        weights - net weights
        r - random generator
        Returns:
        the mean square error of neural network output compared to expected output.

      • nntrainGD

        public double nntrainGD(int nInputs,
                        int nOutputs,
                        double[][] examples,
                        double[][] outputs,
                        int[] topology,
                        double[] weights,
                        Randomize r)

        trains a perceptron with Conjugated Descendent algorithm and returns the mean square error of neural network output compared to expected output.

        Parameters:
        nInputs - number of inputs in first layer
        nOutputs - number of output in output layer
        examples - training examples
        outputs - expected outputs
        topology - net topology (cardinality of the hidder layers)
        weights - net weights
        r - random generator
        Returns:
        the mean square error of neural network output compared to expected output.

      • nnoutput

        public double[] nnoutput(double[] x)
        Calculated the output of present perceptron with input x and returns it in original scale.
        Parameters:
        x - the inputs for feeding the perceptron.
        Returns:
        a vector with the output of perceptron.

      • printNet

        public java.lang.String printNet()
        Returns the weights as a String for printing or storing purposes
